name: Afterimage (itch) (TheLucky)
description:
A short 2D puzzle platformer where you can summon your past self
Controls:
A, D - move left/right

space - jump

r - summon clone

e - pause clone

q - reset level

Programming, Art, and Level Design:

Tyler Le

Itch: https://thelucky.itch.io/

Music:
Twitter: http://twitter.com/intheautumnsky Itch.io: https://highintheautumnsky.itch.io/
